title: Bronze or silver top laner needed for ranked team
body:
As the title says, we already have a jungle, adc, sup and mid.

Must be able to play at least 2 tanks (eg. Maokai and Malphite)

MUST HAVE SKYPE OR TEAMSPEAK

Add spook em if you wish to try out.

replies.body: Probs late, and probs too high to play if you have bronze players there but i am Gold 5 and main top lane and mid. Play {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:62}}
Hope I'm not too late, I'm a {{champion:122}} main but I also play {{champion:17}} when my favourite dunkmaster is banned.
added. i mainly play nasus, mundo
Yeah, I have had a break from lol, was a supp/ top main. Keen to get back into the competitive scene, I previously was in a gold 3 ranked team. Add me if you're down.
